https://tmrev.io/movie/317954-City of Gold 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/uu5dxoVi791363dRQeaPAqAyzrE.jpg As the unabashed cradle of Hollywood superficiality and smoggy urban sprawl, Los Angeles has long been condemned as a cultural wasteland. In the richly penetrating documentary odyssey City of Gold, Pulitzer Prize-winning food critic Jonathan Gold shows us another Los Angeles, where ethnic cooking is a kaleidoscopic portal to the mysteries of an unwieldy city and the soul of America. City of Gold
